_88labeled_datum.description: Represents a datum with its label.
_88labeled_datum.title: labeled_datum

items.description: Represents a label of this datum.
items.title: label

$eref.description: Represents a set of data used for machine learning in Jubatus.
$eref.title: datum

items.description: Input data represented in string. It is represented as key-value pairs of data. Name of keys cannot contain “$” sign.
items.title: string_values

items.description: Input data represented in numeric value. It is represented as key-value pairs of data.
items.title: num_values

items.description: Input data represented in binary value. It is represented as key-value pairs of data.
items.title: binary_values

items.description: Represents a probability value for the label. Higher score value means that the estimated label is more confident.
items.title: score

___delete_label.description: Deleting label. True if jubatus success to delete. False if the label is not exists.
___delete_label.title: delete_label

___return.description: True if jubatus success to delete label. False if the label is not exists.

___set_label.description: Append new label. If the label is already exist, it fails. New label is add when label found in train method argument, too.
___set_label.title: set_label

___return.description: True if the new label was not exist. False if the label already exists.

___get_labels.description: Returns the number of trained data for each label. If method is NN , the number of trained data that are deleted by unlearner is not include in this count.
___get_labels.title: get_labels

___return.description: Pairs of label and the number of trained data

___classify.description: Estimates labels from given data. This API is designed to accept bulk classification with list of datum.
___classify.title: classify

___return.description: List of list of estimate_result, in order of given datum

items.description: Represents a probability value for the label. Higher score value means that the estimated label is more confident.
items.title: score

$eref.description: Represents a set of data used for machine learning in Jubatus.
$eref.title: datum

items.description: Input data represented in string. It is represented as key-value pairs of data. Name of keys cannot contain “$” sign.
items.title: string_values

items.description: Input data represented in numeric value. It is represented as key-value pairs of data.
items.title: num_values

items.description: Input data represented in binary value. It is represented as key-value pairs of data.
items.title: binary_values

___train.description: Trains and updates the model. labeled_datum is a tuple of datum and its label. This API is designed to accept bulk update with list of labeled_datum.
___train.title: train

___return.description: Number of trained datum (i.e., the length of the data)

items.description: list of tuple of label and datum
items.title: data

$eref.description: Represents a datum with its label.
$eref.title: labeled_datum

items.description: Represents a label of this datum.
items.title: label
